hero.headline: Collaborate in Real-Time on Shared Whiteboards
hero.subheadline: SynchBoard is a full-stack collaborative whiteboard application built with React, Spring Boot, and WebSockets. Create, share, and draw together in real-time.

features.sectionSubtitle: Everything you need for seamless collaboration

realtime.title: Real-time Collaboration
realtime.description: Work together with your team in real-time. See cursor positions, drawings, and changes instantly synchronized across all connected users.

drawing.title: Rich Drawing Tools
drawing.description: 12+ professional drawing tools including freehand pen, shapes, lines, arrows, text, sticky notes, and image uploads.

boards.title: Board Management
boards.description: Create unlimited boards, organize them with custom names, invite team members, and manage permissions with admin controls.

security.title: Secure Authentication
security.description: Enterprise-grade security with JWT authentication, OAuth2 Google login, email verification, and secure password reset flows.

themes.title: Themes & Languages
themes.description: Fully customizable experience with light and dark themes, canvas color presets, and full RTL support for English and Hebrew.

mobile.title: Mobile Responsive
mobile.description: Optimized for all devices with touch-friendly controls, responsive layouts, and mobile-specific UI adaptations.

screenshots.workspaceEnDark: Easy on the eyes with native Dark Mode
screenshots.workspaceHeLight: Full RTL support for Hebrew and other languages

cta.headline: Ready to See It in Action?
cta.subheadline: Built with React, TypeScript, Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, Docker, and WebSockets

footer.description: A full-stack collaborative whiteboard application demonstrating modern web development practices.

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.description: Get the latest updates and news about the project.
